title: Insurgent

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player. If they've attacked or caused the hanging of a fellow Loyalist, you'll deal a roleblock and deal a Basic attack to them. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When using the factional investigation, guess the player's role before the night ends. You'll deal a Powerful attack to them if your guess was correct.
- When using the factional protection, you'll deal a Basic attack to one of the target's visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep the Governor alive the entire game and eradicate those who will not submit to the Governor's rule.

desc:
Post 3478
*Together with the Governor, we'll start a revolution.*
